nirmanakaruweku ho ese nowana oonama pudgalayekuta anagathayedi tha්rimana mudranayata sambandhawa katayuthu kala haka.jaiwa saila wala tha්rimana wyuha wani sankirna wyuha walin rudhirasaila, same pataka(itha siyum wiyaman)menma rohal waladima wenath ayekuge hadawathak nowa obage jana, saila bhawithayen obata hadawathak tha්rimana mudranaya kirimata hakiwanu athayiee pilibanda parikshana wala niyuthu widyagnyayin adahas pala karayi.japanaye samagamak gabini mawwarunge skan jayarupaya wenuwata owunge udaraya (daruwada samanga) tha්rimana swarupaya bhauthika nimawumak lesa laba dimata katayuthu karana bawa dakwe.

ohu dun pilithura nam " kuda wayase pawidi nokaloth tharuna wiyedi prema sambandatha athikaraganna bawath eeta pasu mowun pawidi nowana nisa sasanaya pawathwa ganimata swamin wahansela nomathi wana bawayi " mehi balubalmata aththak athayi sithuwath meya niwaradi sathya noweyi ada pawa awabodayen pawidi wana piris siti udaharana tharunayan pawidi nowimata anek hethuwa nam apa rate awawadaya itha ihalin thibunath aadarshaya nothibimayi.

aandu peraliya arambaiyayi uuwa mathiwarana prathipalaya thulin nigamanaya kirima muda hath gawwak thiya amuda gasimaki.anik athin harin harunu wita manapa chanda panas dahasa ikmawimata ekadu ejapa apekshakayekuta haki wi natha.habayi me nam aanduwata rathu eliyaki.ejapeta kaha eliyaki.aakarshaniya wada piliwelak thula eksath peramunakwa wada kaloth mona rajya yanthrana thaga marakam mada wuwa aanduwata pahadili abhiyogayak kala haki bawath mahindawa paradawiya nohaka yanna mithyawak bawath pahadiliya.habayi sajith karu wani kakul mattu paradal kusitha nayakayin samaga ranilge hithuwakkara bala lobhaya menma harin pranandu wuwa oonama mohothaka aanduwe wadi karawa gatha haki mahindage deshapalana satakapatakama mada eya itha asiru katayuththaki.anek athata lankawe deshapalana jana mathaya nonila washayen meheyawannata datha kana maharajala tiranla dilith jayawirala balans kara ganimada ranilta abhiyogayaki.
